alert.note: Alert for Clay; East Polk; Mahnomen; Norman; Red Lake; West Becker; West Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 5:48AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Red Lake, northeastern Clay, eastern Norman, south central Polk, western Mahnomen and northwestern Becker Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 548 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Flaming to near Hawley. Movement was north to northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Flaming around 550 AM CDT. Fertile around 555 AM CDT. Ulen and Maple Bay around 600 AM CDT. Syre, Dugdale and Flom around 605 AM CDT. Twin Valley, Terrebonne and Faith around 610 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Clay; East Polk; Mahnomen; Norman; Red Lake; West Becker; West Polk
